column2: I suppose we're doing this, so let's try and throw a spanner in the works!
This fight is for the Republic! We do them proud!
Will we be more than just mosquitoes to a lion?
This is so my family can live safely one day!!
If any of you die ... I'll make sure you're returned to your kin. Mostly.
I just need a clean shot to make it count.
This time I will not make the same mistakes.
I don't think this is working.
Shit! We can't hold this position forever!
Frogs in a pot, the heat has risen to the break.
Statistically we have a...a- we don't have a chance.
